Parkour Classes in Scranton, Pennsylvania

It is certain that parkour is about individual development. But the parkour practitioner also knows that parkour is also about community, kinship, and camaraderie. The gathering and communal training of parkour practitioners is the catalyst for creating life-long friendships and the glue that holds the community together.

Classes Begin Sunday, October 11th

October 2015 Location: Nay Aug Park. Meet near the water slide.

Time: Promptly at 3:00pm. We may leave the area and it might be difficult to find us.

Cost: Classes cost $20. No monthly contract or obligation. Just pay as you come, and keep coming if you like what we do!

Classes with Parkour Endure are led by coaches certified through A.D.A.P.T. You, are guaranteed the highest quality parkour coaching offered in the region.

Stay Informed! Join our email list.

Organized weekly Parkour classes are in the works for the Scranton, Pennsylvania starting in October 2015.

To stay updated about parkour classes in Scranton, submit your email address below to become a member of our mailing list.
